page-summaries.my-trips: In the list below there are all your accepted trips. You can view both upcoming and past trips.
page-summaries.invitations: In the list below there are all trips where you are invited to participate. You can accept or reject the invitations.
page-summaries.my-organized-trips: In the list below there are all your organized trips. You can edit these trips.
page-summaries.all-trips: In the list below there are all trips organized by all users.

alerts.login-info: Please log in using your email and password
alerts.login-failed: Wrong email or password. Please try again

trip-list.empty-list: No trips match the selected criteria

trip-merge.to-trip-title: Chosen trip on which another trip will be merged
trip-merge.mergeable-trips-label: Choose a trip to merge from the list below. Only trips with similar dates and same locations can be merged.
trip-merge.modal-no-mergeable-trips: No trips match the merge criteria

office.empty-list: No offices match the selected criteria
office.title: Title

error.no-access-rights-error: You are not allowed to use this
error.OFFICE_VALIDATION_CAPACITY: Error, office must have a capacity
error.OFFICE_VALIDATION_TITLE: Error, office must have a title
error.TRIP_VALIDATION_DATE_NOT_PROVIDED: Error, trip must have end and start dates
error.TRIP_VALIDATION_DATE_END_BEFORE_NOW: Error, trip end date must be later than now
error.TRIP_VALIDATION_DATE_START_BEFORE_NOW: Error, trip start date must be later than now
error.TRIP_VALIDATION_DATE_START_AFTER_END: Error, trip start date cannot be after end date
error.TRIP_VALIDATION_OFFICE_SAME: Error, from and to offices cannot be same
error.TRIP_VALIDATION_PARTICIPANT_DOES_NOT_EXI: Error, trip participant does not exist
